website_summaries.verdict: This extra-affordable spinning rod may not be the best of the best, but we give it above average marks across the board, making it an excellent introductory model.
cons: This spinning rod is available in far fewer sizes than the ranges offered by competing models

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and strong.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fishing rod for the price. I've used it both for inshore fishing and some offshore (10-15 miles out). It casts well and has landed me quite a few fish. The only slight drawback I have had with this rod is the handle shape. Due to the handle shape, it can sometimes be a little more difficult to get the rod out of a short rod holder. If the rod holder is a long tube, there isn't any problem; but if the tube is shorter than the handle, sometimes the wider bottom part of the handle will catch. This is a minor inconvenience and only applies to specific rod holders. Otherwise, this fishing rod is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent rod & customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it it for a month now prior to leaving a review and have been fishing with it every chance i get and its good quality all-around fishing rod. The rod is very light weight and I've spent quite a few hours fishing per day with no fatigue. I even hiked through a local park fishing a lake for a few hours carrying this rod around and didn't have any issues. I would highly recommend this rod vs getting a cheap rod/combo set from your local sporting goods/walmart store. the difference is night and day. and sportmall has very good customer service if you need to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Khoa V.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased this from another seller but accidentally stepped on the rod tip so was happy to find this Customer service is responsive and they will address your problems The rod is on the flimsy side medium light tip is pretty useless it broke on a hook set... but the medium tip has been good I’m able to cast further and smoothly with the rod But if I can find other rods such as cabelas, Lee’s, or abu Garcia rods on sale which is around 30-40$, I’d much rather go with that
customer_reviews.author: ICEbulrae

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGES REEL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple problems with this rod. 1: the rod came with scratches and some sort of paint mark that clearly shouldn’t be there (looks like melted plastic or something) 2: the reel screw doesn’t have a slit for the reel so it’s bare metal scraping against metal. Screw my brand new $200 spinner reel in and it’s now damaged with scratches. 3: the first ring is about half the size as shown in picture and the loop where you put your hook is also completely different and 100% useless. I would not recommend this rod to anyone. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: I have spent hundreds and hundreds of $$ over the years and at $29.99 these represent OUTSTANDING value for money. Very well made and nicely finished and i love the tip action . I did receive one which was slightly cracked but then i live in Vietnam and these came via a freight forwarder . I called the vendor and they are making good so excellent customer service. The only thing they lack is a cork handle as I am a purist and like my cork but other than that....10/10
customer_reviews.author: waratahpastoralco

customer_reviews.title: Opt for the entsport camo rod instead.
customer_reviews.text: Bought rod for some light fishing on a trip. Prior to using the rod I noticed a complete disconnect from one of the eyelet sections, allowing part of the rod to free spin and disconnect from end section. Very disappointed as I have made several successful purchases of the camo baitcaster rod by entsport. Would not recommend this model, and will be returning same.
customer_reviews.author: Shame

customer_reviews.title: I'll try again thanks to Entsport
customer_reviews.text: An update and a 4 star rating. The original rod snapped after a handful of casts on a small fish. Without any contact from me, the Entsport people replaced the top portion with no action required of me. This is top shelf customer service. Today I'll be trying out the rod again with a jig and trailer. I hope the rod is the same quality as the company.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Delsack

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Took this out for her maiden voyage and loved it! It's light and quick but strong. I'm usually one for full cork handles but this handle feels good. The foam is dense and well sealed. The eyes are good and straight, and i love the hook loop placement; which makes the hook tip curve safely toward the rod (instead of off the side like most rods that have them). I'll update if the rod doesn't hold up over time but upfront I'm pleasantly surprised! Love the color, too!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: its a super strong rod
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap rod to put on my kastking, i used both the ML and M, its a super strong rod, great flex. First day out got 2 smallies and a rock bass. While not as good as my more expensive rod, its very well worth the money. My only complaint is there is no hook mount on the base of the rod, but its not a big deal. Very portable, and strong for a 2 piece casting rod.
customer_reviews.author: Thang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love these, great cast an great looks.
customer_reviews.text: I have rods from Abu Garcia to Ugly Stick, and I have grown to love these. The action is great and allows a nice long cast. They look awesome, especially when paired with the spinning reel. Definitely worth the money. I will be ordering a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Karl F

customer_reviews.title: So far really happy with this pole.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pole. Yesterday I put it through a pretty rigorous day of fishing. Overall I'm really happy with it. The extra length has made for some of the longest casts I've ever seen. It also allowed me to get things unstuck, easier than normal, around vegetation around me and in the water. I paired it with a Kastking spinning reel (would not recommend) and the 10lb braided spider wire (would definitely recommend.)
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT waste your money....felt cheap as heck right out of the box and then the pole literally broke into pieces pulling in a channel cat on the river that weighed less than 2lbs....first fish ever on the pole.....I called and complained, they offered to give me a new pole in exchange for a positive customer service review.......yeah eff that, this is pure junk plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy B

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I've been fishing fresh and salt for 70 years. Have too many rods and reels, can't help buying. This rod is impressive for the price. Well built with latest materials. Will test with 10 -15 lb. braid and 20 lb. leader for slot Reds and Seatrout. It should be fine and great to throw in the truck and not worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Nick

customer_reviews.title: New Review
customer_reviews.text: Okay the rods arrived a day late because they were delivered to the wrong address. Not even on the same road luckily a lot of people know where i live and brought it to me. Secondly on one of the rods the second eye from the reel was bent out of shape almost to the point of not being useable. A little bit of slow pressure and i was able to bend it almost into its correct shape.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES A LEBOUEF

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support update
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what to review about it since i got only two top pieces. Was cheap and thought it was a bargain but like they say if it seems too good to be true than it probably is. If the intention was to sell two top pieces than why put it on a listing of a full rod? *update* Was contacted by customer support and offered a complete rod to replqce the bad order, very satisfied with the support.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Fished with it 3 times. Hooked into a 2-3 pound bass and the rod actually snapped in half right above where the 2 parts of the rod meet while reeling it in. Would never recommend. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: great rod
customer_reviews.text: I have caught 16 bass up to 3.5lbs This rod will set the hook when using plastic worms with ease. This is truly a nice looking rod and has a strong backbone for setting the hook. I look forward to catching many fish and bigger fish in both fresh and saltwater. I will buy from this seller again. GREAT ROD..........GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.author: rlp review

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second rod we've purchased from Entsports and I am still blown away at the quality, build construction and most of all the price. It cast like a dream, the sensitivity is amazing and its one of the lightest rods I own. I have many other spinning rods and this competes with the most expensive ones. Its scary ordering fishing rods online but give this a try. you will be very happy with the rod. and they will work with you if you have any questions. item shipped very fast, was well packaged and arrived undamaged. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: SteveS

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Costumer service is standing behind their product.  Very happy
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: customer service contacted me after original post and are standing behind their product. They are shipping new rod tip at no cost. It is refreshing that companies stand behind their product and their quality. ORIGINAL: Reviewed all reviews thought this would be a good rod. Arrived all intact. Took it out fishing for the first time, and literally the very first cast the rod snapped in two right above where the two pieces join together. There is another review that says the same thing. So two people with the same issue, apparently there is a design flaw with the product. I wouldn’t waste your money unfortunately. I had high hopes for this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Chad lang

customer_reviews.title: This rod has some nice play and I really like the 7' length
customer_reviews.text: This rod has some nice play and I really like the 7' length. This will be used a lot in my fishing arsenal. The eyelets are great and the reel connection is very solid. Looking forward to catching more fish with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pole arrived on time...Check, Quality seems pretty good...Check, Caught a 4.5lbs Large Mouth Bass on second throw using a Wacky Rig setup...Check Check, but unfortunately the Medium Light tip broke right as I got the fish to shore (still got the fish in). After a few to many emails back and fourth, they agreed to replace the rod. If it hadn't taken so many emails, I would have given it a 5. They kept wanting me to write a positive feedback before they would replace the rod...not happening and they finally agreed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Rod Blank
customer_reviews.text: The seller solved an issue I had with the rod quickly and completely. The rod is a great buy. John King
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking rod and price
customer_reviews.text: This rod looks and feels great-can't wait to do some fishing with it. Thank you Fished with this rod and it’s great. Good feel quick response, going to buy another one !
customer_reviews.author: Harry M.

customer_reviews.title: This rod is awesome. Casts and handles fish like a dream
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!!!!!!!!! This rod is awesome. Casts and handles fish like a dream. Will be my goto rod. Definitely will get 2 more while they are avalable. Thanks Entsport......Great Job...........
customer_reviews.author: MonaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this rod the end of April today is the 23 July and the second outing I’ve used this rod and it broke about 10 inches above the ferrel joint. Amazon says return date is past. I suggest you do not purchase this rod unless you are only fishing in a small aquarium for guppies.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Leber

customer_reviews.title: no flex in pole
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stiff pole, so it is difficult to hold tension on rod while waiting for a fish to jump on your line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking rod
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking rod , stylish, got the 7 ft med fast action, I love the way it looks , fishing for trout , casts nice and feels good , no issues or complaints so far , only used it once
customer_reviews.author: chad z

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pole for a great value. I'm very confident it will perform well. I have had a great experience with the customer service. They have helped tremendously with a issue I had with the arrival of the product.
customer_reviews.author: jjoh243

customer_reviews.title: Good rod for saltwater and freshwater
customer_reviews.text: I have used this rod to catch flounder and speckled trout at the coast and also catch large mouth bass. In fact this rod helped me recently win my kayak club tournament. Nice action and sensitivity in the rod. I used it mainly for finesse rigs - shaky head and weightless stick bait. The rod performed well. Definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Broken first hook set.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Set the hook on my first fish with it, snapped it right in two. Medium heavy felt stiff like it should - but just doesn’t have the power. It’s brittle, but completely hollow. The fish was 2 lbs at best. Complete waste of time and money. Try a kastking or kalex or some other budget rod before picking this up.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rod. It arrived fast as was packaged well. I paired it with KastKing Royale Legend. The rod has great feel and backbone to get a great hook set. I would recommend this rod to anyone look for an affordable bait caster rod
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Fox

customer_reviews.title: Travels great and easily into luggage! Great action!
customer_reviews.text: Great package, I travel and fish a lot but as you know those 2 piece rods don't fit in your suitcase. This rod fit nicely into my carry on sized bag, making it my favorite new travel accessory! It can take both a spinning and a casting reel and has great action. Fits into my Jet Ski so I have it where ever I go. Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: entsport rod
customer_reviews.text: been a ugly stik user for years this is just as good or better could have a better warrantee not sold on the spilt handle but all in all a good rod for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell S. Mosbrucker

customer_reviews.title: Genuine bargain
customer_reviews.text: To my mind this rod is the best lightweight spinning rod for the money. It is graphite, well-balanced, and just right for my bay and river fishing here on the Chesapeake.
customer_reviews.author: bert shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: I do not like it and it is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: the rod looks great. It's fantastic for firing lures out and the ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, the rod looks great. It's fantastic for firing lures out and the reel seat locks the reel into place. The feel of the rod is very "meh." If you want sensitivity, you'd want to use the Camo Love stick. Also, after a full day of throwing around a jerkbait, the rod tip broke. Aside from all that, the rod is pretty good for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Cuaj

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rod for the price, like it a lot. Comfortable to handle and looks good as well. Probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fishing Rod
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use it, but the rod is better than expected and seems very durable and able to meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Desome

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rod & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 7' Medium. It arrived very quickly which was nice. The rod I have is Black with Blue accents. It looks great! Its very lightweight compared to another 7' rod I have and the Eyelets are smaller too. I love the feel of the rod and have caught a couple bass with it. I works perfectly with my Spinning rod.
customer_reviews.author: mmandin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to be my drop shot rod. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott

customer_reviews.title: Rod arrived in a nice package. Really good looking rod
customer_reviews.text: Rod arrived in a nice package. Really good looking rod. Had an issue and contacted seller and they are rectifying it immediately. Looking forward to fishing this year. Plan on ordering more from them.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmr

customer_reviews.title: Rod is a very nice weight and handles Fish well
customer_reviews.text: Rod is a very nice weight and handles Fish well. Tip broke but was immediately resolved with a new rod
customer_reviews.author: MaryE

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! I am sending it back
customer_reviews.text: This rod is a piece of junk. Tip broke off on first use. I own ten fishing rods, none of them really expensive and this has never happened before. Very disappointed! I am sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice length and color.
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty. The surface is a little rough by the eyes and where the rod connects together, but I'm hoping that won't effect anything.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: good rod for the $$$'s
customer_reviews.text: Good enough. the pic shows 7 eyes you get six. I bought the light, and it is light. I do like this rod but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Pointer89

customer_reviews.title: Poor handlung of details.
customer_reviews.text: The first rod sent to me was for a bait caster and when they sent the replacement the handle was correct but the top section does not seat all the way in as designed this may change the flex during a heavy fight.
customer_reviews.author: herbalbus

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken tip taped to pole. Clearly a return. Now I am unable to get ups to return it. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: open water

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. A lightweight reel that works wellThe rake is great as it allows casting into the wind with a backlash very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Henry T Porter Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great products Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This rod is awesome where can you get a graphite rod with all the technology at this price point The folks at sport mall are awesome there customer service is like no other Buy from them you will be very pleased . I'm a customer for life. The best update 6-28-18 rod tip broke and they are going to replace rod tip with 2 awesome will update later
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rod.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that I broke the first one so I bought another one just like it. If I brake this one I will order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: it broke, damn it
customer_reviews.text: This was a good rod but after a few months of use it broke where the 2 parts connect. It sounded like a gun going off. It was firmly together, well it was a waste of 30 bucks. Before that happened it seemed like it was a good rod. Kinda sad thou.
customer_reviews.author: John Zechmeister

customer_reviews.title: Very good rod for the money have used it in ncg ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good rod for the money have used it in ncg for Brown trout and in fl for bass did a good job I broke it lifting a 2# fish into the boat after more use
customer_reviews.author: glen hunter

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and it performed well...just know the action is moderate on the medium power...if on a budget this is an option, and customer service is on point
customer_reviews.author: Zipper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love theae rods and definitely recommend these for Bass fishing. Super sensitive a d long casting . love these rods
customer_reviews.author: mike johnston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rod
customer_reviews.text: I love this rod and the two tips is really a great idea. For my fishing I chose medium and medium lite. Well made and well balanced. Good looking too!
customer_reviews.author: larry hoehne

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Rod a few weeks ago. Never made it to the water's edge. The tip broke in two places when bending it threading line through the line guides. Return it to Amazon. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rod for my spinning reel for bass fishing. Has really good tip action, and is pretty comfortable in your hand. Looks really nice, and is decent quality for the price. Purchased another for my bait casting reel, but haven't used that one yet.
customer_reviews.author: William Duncan

customer_reviews.title: It is important to receive  a product that you don’t have to work on before you can actually use it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to sand the rod to get it together, other than that it seems to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer F.

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: At first I had a complaint, the supplier quickly offered an alternative that exceeded my expectations. .
customer_reviews.author: Del Mac

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but the eyelets don’t line up so line doesn’t feed well when casting.
customer_reviews.author: Zudie

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Entsport spinning rod in medium wt and I must say it is everything you could ask for. Great feel and action to it nice balance. Overall a great looking and feel in a rod. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Armp

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. Christmas present for my son
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Christmas present for my son. Finally gets to use it now that it is getting warmer. He loves it. Shipping fast and packed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Srom

customer_reviews.title: Fair value
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel, very light weight with strong guides. Power not rated correctly. Rated as medium heavy but feels more like medium light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well made and looking forward to being able to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality made haven't used yet due to winter will ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality made haven't used yet due to winter will be sending another review when put to use
customer_reviews.author: Danny w.  Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Love the fill of this rod
customer_reviews.text: I received excellent customer service with Sportmall! The product received was of good quality, but the best thing was how helpful the staff was. I would recommend Sportmall to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Slone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, light weight rod for bay fishing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, light weight rod for bay fishing! Perfect for san diego bay spotted bay bass, halibut, and calicos. Fished with light tackle, this rod provides action to the bait the fish cant resist! have caught plenty of fish and very satisfied with the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Michael quacinella

customer_reviews.title: This Rod is awesome! Love the colors of it and how light ...
customer_reviews.text: This Rod is awesome! Love the colors of it and how light it is. We will be getting more of these especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fishing rod. Easy to handle. This was a gift for a 12 year old who loves to fish and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Cafarelli

customer_reviews.title: And I really like the cool appearance
customer_reviews.text: A strong but very responsive rod. And I really like the cool appearance. It feels great when you are casting it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great sticks
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to echo the previous reviews and say that for $30, this is just an incredible rod. You can certainly see where they cut corners to save cost (and in turn cut cost to you), but they are minimal and in places where cost reduction is acceptable. These rods will be used for inshore salt water (specks, reds, snook) and I am confident they will stand up to the job...if they don't, I'll report back...but I would be surprised if you hear anything past this initial review.
customer_reviews.author: HHOMedia

customer_reviews.title: The right weight
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a ml rod& got a mh. The only thing I have is the blach sheath it came in& no return sticker. What do I do?

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless. It's made out of very very cheap materials ...
customer_reviews.text: Tip broke after 10 casts. Completely useless . It's made out of very very cheap materials don't ever buy anything from this manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rod love the design and how it feels definitely recommend also great customer service!!

customer_reviews.title: I received excellent customer service with Sportmall
customer_reviews.text: I received excellent customer service with Sportmall! The product received was of good quality, but the best thing was how helpful the staff was. I would recommend Sportmall to anyone!

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great quality.

customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product didnt get the medium heavy and contacted the seller and without a problem came up with a solution awsome product and costumer service. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Feels good casting and fishing fish
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with the action of this rod. Feels good casting and fishing fish. Only caught fish up to 6lbs, don't know how it would hold up to larger fish.

customer_reviews.text: Rod looks solid, anxious to chase some smallmouth bass with it

customer_reviews.text: Item came in different that what listed. I like the rod sent though. Works great and looks awesome.

customer_reviews.text: Very good customer service and will fix any issues you have. The rod was exactly what was expected.

customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Good feel. Light yet strong. Good hook setting on big bass.

customer_reviews.text: Just on appearance and feel. Haven’t caught a fish on them yet but pleased so far

customer_reviews.title: Rod broke on first use - Nice box though.
customer_reviews.text: The pole snapped near the 2nd ring on the first day of use. How disappointing considering how nice and light the rod is and feels in the hand. I love the box though since I'll be using it to send the rod back for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Broken rod
customer_reviews.text: The rod broke while setting the hook on a very small bass.

customer_reviews.text: Bought two rods last year. Both broke in the same day after just using the rods for one season or fishing.

customer_reviews.text: out of the box was damadged I bent it a little and it snapped do not by this product

customer_reviews.text: Great rod, cast great, excellent service, like the look and feel too!

customer_reviews.text: This rod is a great rod I like how light the rod is and it hold fish really good and yes I will buy again and yes I will recommend it to my friends to buy

customer_reviews.title: Great rod Great price Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very well built rods would highly recommend and customer service is wonderful 5* hands down

customer_reviews.text: Nice rod for the money. I took it to destin and it handled keeper size redfish and black drum with no problem.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.author: Patrick A Wetli

customer_reviews.title: A nice long cast with senko on a 8lbs line and ...
customer_reviews.text: Order a medium heavy and received med/light. No problem, use the rod as a finesse fishing rod. A nice long cast with senko on a 8lbs line and caught a lot of largemouth bass. It was my go to rod. Only one issue, it only last a month before it snapped in half during a routine cast. I want to order a replacement, but not willing to take a chance on same outcome. Update 09-12-2016: Sportmall / Amazon, you guys rock!!!! The customer service contact me for a replacement at no charge. That's standing by their product. An awesome customer service. Thank you, I will have my "go to" fishing rod again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

product_meta.title: Entsport E Series - Sirius Spinning Rod 2 Piece 7' Graphite Portable Fishing Rod
product_meta.description:
Entsport Story: 
My grandpa has been fishing more than 70 years. Fishing is a way of life. He had a rod in his hands almost since he could walk. In his early days, he had to find old broken tackle and tried to fix it up so that he could use it. Perhaps because of this history, he learned to love good fishing products. That has not changed over his life, my father’s life and mine. We love to fish, and we love good gear.
However, the most fishing rods in the market are not quality controlled and uniform from one item to the next. Only some big companies can provide great products, but too expensive. So we are determined to develop the unique and qualified fishing tackle at an affordable price.
Our Brand “Entsport” comes from our three beliefs about fishing: Enjoy, Neverending, Technology. So we divide our products into three series: 
E Series: High quality products that are affordable for any fisherman. 
N Series: Premium products represent that entsport's explore to quality will never end.
T Series: Super products focus on the technology and provide the best fishing experience! 

Entsport Service: 
Every product from Entsport has one year warranty. If there is any problem about the quality, please feel free to contact with us by email. We will give you a satisfied solution within 12 hours, as we always stand by our product and provide the best service. 

Specification:
Material: Carbon
Length: 7’
Pieces: 2
Guides: 5+1
Lure weight: 1/8-3/4oz
Line weight: 6-20lbs

The Package Includes:
1 x Fishing Rod
1 x Fishing Rod Protective Bag
feature_bullets: Engineered for sensitivity, based on high-tensile strength carbon blanks, increases strength while reducing weight
Enhanced reel seat with a screw down, cushioned, stainless steel hood keeps reel securely in place during long days on rough water
Stainless steel guides and inserts resist corrosion and transfer vibrations from the line to the rod and to your hand
Equipped with a multi-purpose hook holder, effective hook keeper
High density EVA handles reduce weight and increase comfort, gives greater sensitivity and durability
